intro: Cryptobasis tenuifolia, commonly known as the slenderleaf cryptobasis, is a flowering plant species belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its finely divided, feathery leaves that give it a delicate appearance. The plant produces small, greenish-yellow flowers arranged in umbels, typical of the carrot family. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in woodland areas. Cryptobasis tenuifolia is noted for its aromatic properties and has been used in traditional herbal medicine.
